Posts.Content: Apr 22, 2013 08:31PM oropallo wrote: Look up the study at Cornell with COPPER! Have your copper tested and have a NATURALPATH or a dr who will bring your copper level below 12! This may be incredible insurance for NO reoccurrence. DO IT. Read the study and you will know why. http://weill.cornell.edu/news/releases/wcmc/wcmc_2013/02_13_13.shtml
